body.p: These web tools can help take some of the work out of producing ATF for CDLI and Oracc.
Check and lemmatize ATF files, convert to formats such as HTML and RTF, and produce various kinds of lists from your ATF.
Take some of the work out of typing by quickly setting up a template to type transliterations into.

Submitting individual items for the CDLI catalogue is discouraged when the items are part of a larger publication. This service creates a table with the repetitive data so you can just add in the museum numbers and any other text-specific data.
